name: sandbox
description: A responsive, scalable, and easy to use CSS framework.

scripts.copy-to-docs: cp dist/sandbox-min.css docs/css/ && cp dist/sandbox-min.css.map docs/css/
scripts.build: npm run build-compressed && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run copy-to-docs
scripts.open-sandbox: npm run open-root && npm run open-scss && npm run open-scss-utilities && npm run open-scss-layout && npm run open-scss-buttons && npm run open-scss-forms && npm run open-scss-components
scripts.open-docs: open -a 'Sublime Text' docs/index.html docs/css/*.css docs/_includes/*.html docs/docs/overview.html

author: Dan Cross
